content: प्रतॄ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To cross over. {@--2@} To further, promote, advance. {@--3@} To raise, elevate, enhance. {@--4@} To lengthen, prolong (life). {@--5@} To lead, conduct. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cheat, deceive, take in; मां तथा प्रतार्य <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; किंत्वेवं कविभिः प्रतारितमनास्तत्त्वं विजानन्नपि <ls>Bh. 1. 78.</ls> {@--2@} To mislead, lead astray. {@--3@} To spread, extend.
